title: Why are all big technology companies located in the USA? - Quora

response.answer_text: While setting up a business, the location plays a crucial role. The area can influence important operational factors such as the brand’s ability to promote itself, the overall cost of operation, regulations, and tax benefit schemes set up by the government, as well as the availability of the target customers. The location also helps in deciding the cost and quality of the raw materials required for production. The reason most companies are located in the USA is that it is one of the most favorable locations to establish a business. The World Bank Group’s Doing Business project ranked the United States as the 6th best country for starting a business. There are other beneficial reasons, such as: Labor Laws: The government of the United States has significant laws and regulations in place that offer employers and employees a safe and secure workplace.Favorable Economy: The US is one of the largest consumerists and has an ever-growing economy, which provides organizations with a market to trade their products easily.Skilled Workers: The United States is home to over 5000 colleges and universities that are committed to getting students ready for a career at any level in an office.Technological Advancements: For professional companies, silicon valley is the best place to offering advanced technical alterations that can efficiently enhance business productivity as well as enable worldwide communication.So all in all, the United States is an undeniably ideal region for setting up a technical industry.
